member.name: M:Certificados.API.Controllers.Core.CustomController.Result(Certificados.Domain.Core.dto.ServiceResult,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Gera resultado sem resposta em ServiceResult baseado no AJAX Security do OWASP.
OWASP: https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/AJAX_Security_Cheat_Sheet.html
